solution_line_template: In the park, {num_benches} benches with a capacity of {capacity_per_bench} people each have a total capacity of {num_benches}*{capacity_per_bench} = <<{num_benches}*{capacity_per_bench}={total_capacity}>>{total_capacity} sitting spaces.
If {people_sitting} people are already using spaces, the number of empty spaces is {total_capacity}-{people_sitting} ={empty_spaces}
